meanings.definition: A row of icons or buttons typically found at the top of a computer program window, used for quick access to commonly used functions.
meanings.sent1: The toolbars at the top of the screen have buttons for saving and printing.
meanings.sent2: I customized my toolbars to have shortcuts for editing photos.
meanings.sent3: The toolbars decided to throw a party, but the icons couldn't dance.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cluttered toolbar, full of buttons waiting to be pressed.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the toolbars made the program feel welcoming and easy to use.

meanings.definition: A set of tools or options that can be customized and added to a web browser for easier navigation and functionality.
meanings.sent1: I added new toolbars to my browser for quick access to my favorite websites.
meanings.sent2: The toolbar at the top of the browser had a search box and navigation buttons.
meanings.sent3: The toolbar thought it was a superhero, ready to save the day with its shortcuts.
meanings.sent4: His words were like toolbars, offering different options for understanding the situation.
meanings.sent5: The toolbar was a lifesaver, making it simple to switch between tabs and bookmarks.
